channel.title: Supply-Chain on >_ John Januszczak | Technology & Innovation
channel.description: Recent content in Supply-Chain on >_ John Januszczak | Technology & Innovation

item.title: The NPM Supply Chain Attack: A Wake-Up Call for Digital Infrastructure
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An analysis of the recent NPM supply chain attack, its implications for global digital infrastructure, and the urgent need for enhanced security in open-source ecosystems.

item.title: Commisari
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A B2B venture designed to streamline procurement and inventory management for the food and beverage industry including MSMEs, serving as a digital bridge between both large and small food producers and thousands of local businesses.

item.title: XLog
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Digital logistics platform that leverages blockchain technology to provide end-to-end visibility and embedded supply chain financing for the shipping and trucking industries.
